item.description:
Join rawsome hosts Barb & Alan at their home in Falmouth for a rawlicious potluck on Sunday, June 3rd from 5:30-7:30pm.
Bring a raw vegan dish to share for an evening of good food & good company! Your dish should serve 6-8 people & please try to use as much local & organic ingredients as you can!

Looking forward to seeing you soon! :-)

Call 781-5050 if you get lost.Â  :-)

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: RAW VEGAN POTLUCK ... wooo-hoooo!
